snippet: Stocks were narrowly mixed in uncommitted trade on the first day of business day after a holiday, and seemed likely to stay muddled until Thursday’s meeting of the European Central Bank.
abstract: Stocks are narrowly mixed on the first business day after the Labor Day holiday, and seem likely to stay muddled until midweek meeting of the European Central Bank.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were narrowly mixed in uncommitted trade on the first day of business day after a holiday, and seemed likely to stay muddled until Thursday’s meeting of the European Central Bank.

headline.main: Mired Shares Await Word on Europe
headline.print_headline: Mired Shares Await Word On Europe
